scene_description_enriched: A bearded elder, likely a saint or prophet, is depicted in a three-quarter profile, looking to the right. He wears a distinctive red and gold striped hat and a blue robe with gold trim. He holds a golden staff in his right hand. The background features stylized blue mountains and green foliage, suggesting an outdoor setting. A golden halo encircles his head, indicating his sanctity. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
